title: Star Wars Ahsoka Live Trailer Reaction Kinda Funny
description:
Tim and Barrett react and breakdown the latest Disney Plus Star Wars Ahsoka trailer.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
